text: 33:11 1 Eghaghaniba 16:34; 2 Eghaghaniba 5:13; 7:3; Esra 3:11; Onger Akaba 100:5; 106:1; 107:1; 118:1; 136:1Egh me navir aghuimɨn ikɨva, bar akuegh poroghamiba uarir ikiamin isabar amuam. Egh gumazamiziba na mɨnabir ofaba inigh Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn izam. Egh me ofaba inigh izɨ, kamaghɨn ighiaba bangam:
